body.p: If you like programming, tinkering, having fun with software and if you are up for a challenge, we have something exciting for you: "Youth Hacking 4 Freedom" (YH4F), the FSFE's hacking competition for young people from Europe! On top you can win up to â‚¬4096 and a trip to Brussels for the award ceremony!

The programming period of this year's YH4F round runs from 1 January to 30 June 2025. Teenagers between 14 and 18 years and living in Europe are welcome to join the competition. You can register for free.
